name: Perim Beta
description: The Trill have inhabited this region of the Origin Sector in order to find an alternative home for their symbionts. Joined Trill have feared the implications of the Federation’s ongoing war with the Romulans and Klingons, and see opportunity in Progenitor resources and technology as a way of preserving their heritage. A tenuous coalition with the Tholian Assembly has assured some additional security as the rush for Isogen and its secrets overwhelms this region.
